data.name: Nigelopia Mini Mix
data.detailed_description:
Nigelopia Mini Mix is a game made by Nigelopians, for Nigelopians. If yer not Nigelopian then I dunno dood! The developers and cast of the game itself love this game to death so somebody in your world might like it as well and that’s why it’s here!

It’s a 2D platformer that plays quite a bit like a (am I allowed to say the name of the series here?) game, and you can play as Nigel Woedinger, or one of us incredibly unique Nigelopian girls. You won’t see girls like us in most places! 10 levels, 4 campaigns with tons of dialogue and what we consider to be awesome music. Nigelopia is also a very sex positive place where girls have very unique body proportions and will stick out their big butts, That’s not a caricature, that’s actually what our bodies look like. LMAO!! I’m sexy. Optionally, you can also turn on Fart Mode if you’re into that sort of thing like us. The game isn’t exactly state of the art, but for some reason it’s hard to feel like it’s SHIT for that! We keep playing it over and over, and we plan to make more. Why do we keep playing it?! Why are we so excited about OURSELVES?!?! What are we?! WHO ARE YOU?!?! ARE YOU MY FRIEND?!?! OH MY GOD!!!

-Reinie-Bunzzzzz~

data.short_description: Nigelopia Mini Mix is a “personal” game, meaning a game made by the developers for the developers. For some weird reason we decided to make it possible for you to play it too if you want! Maybe you should or maybe not! i have no idea they don’t pay me enough for this LMAO -Reinie-Bunzzzzz~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU 4205U @ 1.80GHz 1.80 GHz with leeway
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A computer or toaster built past 2009 should be able to run it
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU 4205U @ 1.80GHz 1.80 GHz or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

data.legal_notice: Dark Paradise Nigelopia is the property of ReinaMilka, Nigelopia X and NigelopiaHQ, All Rights Reserved, What you think yer a fookin’ company ya bloody coin skinta?! I’ll fookin’ brip ye leggings wide opun!!

Now That I Have Found You, Don't Ever Go

content_descriptors.notes: The females in Nigelopia have big butts and cannot lie and you otha brothas can't deny
